item.title: Fineract - Advanced payment allocation
item.description: Since the first repayment strategy got introduced, many followed, but there was one thing common in them: They were hard coding the allocation rules for each transaction type. By introducing - part of the 1.9.0 release - the “Advanced payment allocation” the idea was to have a repayment strategy which was: Supporting dynamic configuration of the allocation rules for transaction types Supporting configuration of more fine-grained allocation rules for future installments
